meanings.definition: A compound containing the superoxide ion, O2-
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the superoxide in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The superoxide is an important part of this chemical reaction.
meanings.sent3: The superoxide seemed to have a mischievous sparkle in its ion.
meanings.sent4: The superoxide was like a tiny, powerful superhero in the chemical world.
meanings.sent5: The superoxide glowed with a vibrant energy, ready to react.

meanings.definition: An anion with the formula O2-
meanings.sent1: We need to understand the properties of superoxide in this experiment.
meanings.sent2: The anion O2- is commonly known as superoxide.
meanings.sent3: The O2- anion, also known as superoxide, was feeling negative today.
meanings.sent4: The superoxide anion was like a pair of tightly bound oxygen atoms.
meanings.sent5: The superoxide anion danced around, full of electric charge.
